entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:36 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %

Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
